description:
Can this course really transform your life? Yes!

You will need to make time to complete all the tasks and be aware of how you are using your mind power techniques. But you will be shown lots of tips and techniques in how to do this easily - and the course is all about you, so it truly will be a rewarding journey to transform your life. 

Based on Profit From Unlimited Thinking, this course is a fun adventure in creativity, understanding yourself better, and thinking BIG. 

It will either uncover hidden promise, or provide the tools to progress what you feel really enthusiastic about, in a logical, practical and informative yet slightly unusual way too.

In this course, you will:

  • learn proven mindpower techniques
  • discover your key and hidden motivators
  • learn the importance of goal-setting
  • identify and set major & minor goals
  • realise the importance of purpose
  • be given tips & techniques in affirming correctly
  • be given tips & techniques in visualisation
  • learn how to stimulate your imagination
  • learn the importance of words
  • discover the mind-body connection
  • understand time
  • learn how to make intuition work for you
  • be guided through mind & spirit basics
  • be guided through important metaphysical principles
  • be shown the importance of self-hypnosis
  • be given a sample self-hypnosis script to work with
  • be given an overview of oracles
  • be shown how to create your own oracle
  • be taught the power of sound and silence
  • discover the importance of IQ EQ and SQ

And much much more!

You will also be taught how to manage the change that is inevitable when your goals start to manifest.

You will also be shown how to solve problems and how to get ideas to take you along the path you desire.

On completion of this course, you will have learned how to discover your hidden needs and wants, how to place a value on yourself and your life - and how to take the steps to enhance or even transform your life - should you wish.

Some comments about this course:

MD wrote: "Euphrosene Labon's lecture series (audio) has become my go-to for stress relief. I feel as if she's sitting across the table from me. My whole being gets lighter as I listen. "

RJ wrote: "Amazingly good."
title: Use Your Creative Mindpower To Transform Your Life
